note.p: American businessman and publisher. Director with responsibility for advertisement sales of the Index, published in Toledo, Ohio, until its relaunch in 1873. Edited and published pamphlets and books through Asa K. Butts & Company.
Connecticut town birth records, pre-1870 (Barbour collection) (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 November 2017)
United States Federal Census 1880 (Bayonne, Hudson, New Jersey 42/20D) (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 November 2017)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 November 2017)
